info.author: Jean Francois Roche
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Introduction
============

Tired of copy paste HISTORY.txt to sphinx documentation, this package just
do the same but via code (using setuptools methods).

Usage
=====

Add a dependency on ``collective.sphinx.includechangelog``.

And just add into your sphinx document::

.. includechangelog:: your.package


Changelog
=========

0.1.1 (2013-06-07)
------------------

* Fix when package referred by directive is not found.
  [gotcha]


0.1 (2009-11-23)
----------------

* Initial private release.
  [jfroche]
info.name: collective.sphinx.includechangelog
info.summary: Include changelog extracted from egg information  into sphinx documentation.
info.html_description:
Introduction

Tired of copy paste HISTORY.txt to sphinx documentation, this package just do the same but via code (using setuptools methods).

Usage

Add a dependency on collective.sphinx.includechangelog.

And just add into your sphinx document:

.. includechangelog:: your.package

Changelog

0.1.1 (2013-06-07)

  • Fix when package referred by directive is not found. [gotcha]

0.1 (2009-11-23)

  • Initial private release. [jfroche]
